message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,000,000.  It's a great deal for you, and I'm confident it will be very valuable to your business.  Let me know what you think!

I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget. Can you consider my counteroffer?

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $900,000 is still a bit low for me. I'm willing to come down to $950,000. This is a great price for the value this product will bring to your business. I'm confident we can find a solution that works for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $925,000. Can you consider this revised offer?
